    1: <?php
    2: namespace Symbiotatk\Symbtk\Resource\Route;
    3:
    4: use Symbiotatk\Symbtk AS Main;
    5: use Symbiotatk\Symbtk\Env AS Env;
    6:
    7: /** [not implemented]
    8: * @return false
    9: */
    10: function FunctionalMappings() {
    11: return false;
    12: }
    13:
    14: /** Verify configuration route reference, and assemble route meta-data object
    15: * @param Object $config
    16: * @return Mixed $obj false || [ 'array', 'resource', 'route', 'template_vars' ]
    17: */
    18: function Parse(Object $obj) {
    19: $req = find_route($obj);
    20:
    21: return ($req)
    22: ? (object) [
    23: 'rc' => ((array) $obj->rc)[$req],
    24: 'resource' => Env\Param('resource'),
    25: 'route' => $req,
    26: 'template_vars' => $obj->template_vars
    27: ]
    28: : (object) [
    29: 'rc' => (isset(((array) $obj->rc)[Main\APP_DEFAULT_ROUTE]))
    30: ? ((array) $obj->rc)[Main\APP_DEFAULT_ROUTE]
    31: : false,
    32: 'resource' => false,
    33: 'route' => false,
    34: 'template_vars' => $obj->template_vars
    35: ];
    36: }
    37:
    38: /** Find all configuration route references, and filter by Env\Param('route')
    39: * @param Object $config
    40: * @return Mixed $obj false || $array
    41: */
    42: function find_route(Object $obj) {
    43: $keys = array_keys((array) $obj->rc);
    44: $keys = array_filter($keys, function ($el) {
    45: return (substr($el, 0, 1) === Env\PATH_DELIMITER)
    46: ? $el
    47: : false;
    48: });
    49:
    50: usort($keys, function($a, $b) {
    51: return strlen($b) - strlen($a);
    52: });
    53:
    54: $route = Env\Param('route');
    55: for ($i=0; $i < sizeof($keys); $i++) {
    56: if (
    57: $keys[$i] === $route ||
    58: $keys[$i].Env\PATH_DELIMITER === substr($route, 0, strlen($keys[$i])+1)) {
    59: return $keys[$i];
    60: }
    61: }
    62: return false;
    63: }
    64:
